AD.name: Task ID
AD.description: A unique identifier for the task

AD.name: Repository Factory Filter
AD.description: Ldap filter for repository factory. Factory defines where and how the work items will be read

AD.name: Work Item Path
AD.description: The path where the work items are located

AD.name: Policy Filter
AD.description: Ldap filter for the balancing Policy. Balancing Policy defines how the work items will be distributed

AD.name: Worker Filter
AD.description: Ldap filter for the Worker to use. Worker defines how each item will be processed
